text: Julie Bindel (born 20 July 1962) is an English writer. She is a lesbianIs sexual orientation a choice? and radical feminist. She lives in Crouch End, London. She is a freelance journalist. Her work is often published by The Guardian. Bindel edits Gaze: A Modern Review. ==Early life== She became involved in feminism in 1979 as a teenager in Leeds. In 1990 she started Justice for Women with other feminists. == References == Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:British feminists Category:English LGBT writers Category:English journalists Category:Feminist writers Category:Lesbian feminists Category:LGBT journalists Category:Radical feminists Category:Writers from Leeds
title: Julie Bindel
